body.text: Next, I need you to login to Aha and create something called an "Activity webhook." The button below will take you where you need to go.
Once you are in, scroll down until you find the "Activity Webhood" option under API header.
Did you find it? Good. Now, I need you to enter the following into the "Hook URL" field.

Next, I need you to select the events you want to subscribe to. I only support the following events:- Everything related to features- Ideas > Name- Ideas > Status- Ideas > Public commentHere is a video to show you what to do.
